text: qul -ayha alrswl- lmshrky qwmk: 'iina hadhih almebwdat alty tnadwnha likashf aldrr eankum la tamlik dhlk, wala tuqadar ealaa thwylh eankum 'iilaa ghyrkm, wala tuqadar ealaa thwylh min hal 'iilaa hal, falqadr ealaa dhlk hu allah whdh. whdhh alayat eamat fi kl ma yudea min dun allh, mytana kan 'aw ghaybana, min al'anbia' walsaalihin wghyrhm, blfz alastghatht 'aw alduea' 'aw ghyrhma, fala mebwd bihaqi 'iilaa allh
